name: Pinocchio
description: A wooden puppet is brought to life by a fairy and must prove himself brave, truthful, and unselfish to become a real boy.
cast: Dickie Jones, Cliff Edwards, Christian Rub

name: The Jungle Book
description: Raised by wolves in the Indian jungle, Mowgli sets out on a thrilling journey of self-discovery, facing fearsome foes like Shere Khan and finding friends in Baloo and Bagheera.
cast: Neel Sethi, Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley, Idris Elba

name: Moana
description: An adventurous Polynesian teenager sets sail across the ocean to save her island, discovering her destiny and the power within along the way.

name: Stanley Ka Dabba
description: A schoolboy hides his personal struggle while facing pressure from a teacher obsessed with lunchboxes.

name: Bhootnath
description: A boy befriends a ghost who resides in his new house, leading to a mix of laughs and lessons.

name: Iqbal
description: A deaf and mute boy pursues his dream to become a cricketer despite all odds and inspires everyone.

name: Frozen II
description: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven embark on a journey beyond Arendelle to uncover the origin of Elsa’s powers and save their kingdom.
cast: Idina Menzel, Kristen Bell, Josh Gad, Jonathan Groff

name: Cinderella
description: After losing her parents, kind-hearted Ella is mistreated by her stepmother and stepsisters—until a magical encounter changes her life forever.
cast: Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden

name: Tangled
description: Rapunzel, a spirited girl with magical long hair, escapes her tower with the help of a charming thief to discover the world and her true identity.
cast: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy

name: Aladdin
description: A kind-hearted street urchin discovers a magical lamp and is granted three wishes by a genie, setting off on a thrilling adventure to win the heart of Princess Jasmine.
cast: Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Will Smith

name: Encanto
description: In a magical Colombian family where everyone has a unique gift—except one girl—young Mirabel discovers she may be her family's last hope when their powers begin to fade.
cast: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo
director: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith

name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
description: When a jealous queen tries to eliminate her stepdaughter, Snow White finds refuge with seven kind dwarfs and learns the true meaning of friendship and love.
cast: Adriana Caselotti, Lucille La Verne, Harry Stockwell

name: Tarzan
description: Raised by gorillas in the jungle, Tarzan discovers his human roots when explorers arrive, forcing him to choose between two worlds—and protect his family from danger.
cast: Tony Goldwyn, Minnie Driver, Glenn Close, Rosie O'Donnell

name: Monsters, Inc.
description: Best friends Sulley and Mike work at Monsters, Inc., where they scare kids for energy—until a little girl named Boo sneaks into their world and turns everything upside down.
cast: John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi

name: Lightyear
description: The origin story of legendary Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear, who embarks on an intergalactic adventure that inspires the iconic toy in the Toy Story universe.
cast: Chris Evans, Keke Palmer, Peter Sohn, Taika Waititi

name: Bhootnath Returns
description: The ghost returns to Earth and teams up with a young boy to take on a corrupt politician in this funny, socially relevant tale.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Parth Bhalerao, Boman Irani

name: Raju Chacha
description: Three orphaned children find protection and love in a conman posing as their uncle in this emotional and action-filled ride.

name: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
description: Four mischievous friends take refuge in a blind couple's house pretending to be their grandson, leading to hilarious chaos and mistaken identities.
cast: Ajay Devgn, Arshad Warsi, Sharman Joshi, Tusshar Kapoor, Paresh Rawal

name: Hawa Hawai
description: A poor boy dreams of becoming a skating champion with help from his coach and supportive friends.

name: The Blue Umbrella
description: A young girl’s prized blue umbrella brings envy and a quiet lesson in forgiveness to her village.

name: The Lion King (1994)
description: Simba, a lion cub prince, flees his kingdom only to return years later to reclaim it from his treacherous uncle.

name: Finding Nemo
description: A timid clownfish sets out on an epic journey across the ocean to find his missing son.

name: Up
description: An old man ties thousands of balloons to his house to fulfill his late wife’s dream, accidentally taking a young boy along for the ride.

name: Paddington
description: A polite young bear from Peru finds a home with a British family while evading an evil taxidermist.

name: The Incredibles
description: A superhero family comes out of hiding to save the world from a new villain — together.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A Viking boy befriends a feared dragon, changing his people's beliefs about the creatures forever.

name: Matilda
description: A gifted girl uses her telekinetic powers to fight back against cruel adults in her life.

name: Coco
description: A young boy explores the Land of the Dead to discover his family's secrets and his love for music.

name: Kung Fu Panda
description: A clumsy panda becomes the chosen Dragon Warrior and must protect the Valley of Peace.

name: WALL·E
description: In a future Earth abandoned by humans, a small robot finds love and purpose beyond his programming.
